bill_title: include lithium in the definition of precious metal for purposes of the minerals severance tax.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to classify lithium as a precious metal for the purpose of taxation and to authorize a new tax. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 10-39-42 be AMENDED: 10-39-42. Terms used in this chapter mean: (1) "Department," the South Dakota Department of Revenue; (2) "Precious metals," gold, and silver, and lithium; (3) "Secretary," the secretary of the South Dakota Department of Revenue department; and (4) "Severing," the mining, extracting, or producing of any precious metal.
